text: Khalid Salleh (29 February 1948 â€“ 23 July 2018) was a Malaysian actor and poet. He was born in Kajang, Selangor. He was known for his roles in Penghujung Malam, Azizah The Legend, Jogho, Kaki Bakar, Buai Laju-Laju, and Hanyut. Salleh died on 23 July 2018 in Kuala Lumpur from respiratory failure at the age of 70. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1948 births Category:2018 deaths Category:People from Selangor Category:Malaysian actors
title: Khalid Salleh
